title: Master’s in Business Analytics and Information Systems
description: Pursuing a Master’s in Business Analytics and Information Systems at the University of South Florida, I am developing expertise in data analysis, information systems, and strategic decision-making. My studies focus on advanced data analytics, business intelligence, predictive modeling, and information systems management. Engaging in practical projects, I am preparing to leverage data-driven insights to solve complex business challenges and drive organizational success.

title: Bachelor of Technology in Mechanical Engineering
organization: DVR&DR. Hima Sekhar Mic College of Technology
description: I hold a Bachelor of Technology in Mechanical Engineering from DVR&DR. Hima Sekhar Mic College of Technology, where I gained a comprehensive foundation in mechanical engineering principles and practices. My coursework covered key areas such as thermodynamics, fluid mechanics, material science, and manufacturing processes. I engaged in hands-on projects and practical training, which allowed me to apply theoretical knowledge to real-world engineering problems. My education has equipped me with strong analytical, problem-solving, and technical skills, preparing me for a successful career in the engineering field.
